"The city council announced the opening of a new dog park today, on the corner of Earl and Sommerset. Citizens are not allowed in the dog park. Dogs are not allowed in the dog park. It is possible you will see hooded figures in the dog park. Do not look directly at the dog park. The dog park will not harm you."
